statements: SELECT * FROM player_profile;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_profile ORDER BY game_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_profile WHERE game_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_profile WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM player_profile;
SELECT * FROM player_profile ORDER BY game_score DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player_profile WHERE game_score > 100 ORDER BY game_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, SUM(game_score) AS total_score FROM player_profile GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_score > 500;
SELECT player_name, AVG(game_score) AS average_score FROM player_profile GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM player_profile WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' OR game_score < 50 ORDER BY player_name ASC, game_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_name, score FROM game_statistics WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT player_id, count(stat_id) AS total_games FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_games > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT player_id, game_name, score FROM game_statistics WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, game_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id, game_name
SELECT p.username, gs.game_name, gs.score FROM player_profiles p JOIN game_statistics gs ON p.player_id = gs.player_id
SELECT * FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, game_score FROM game_statistics WHERE game_id = 10
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY rank DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM game_statistics ORDER BY game_date DESC
SELECT player_id, MAX(game_score) AS highest_score FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT player_name, rank FROM player_profiles JOIN leaderboard ON player_profiles.player_id = leaderboard.player_id
SELECT player_id, username, email, total_score FROM players;
SELECT player_id, email, total_score, username FROM players;
SELECT total_score, email, username, player_id FROM players;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM games;
SELECT * FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE players.total_score > 1000 ORDER BY players.total_score DESC, player_stats.score ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT players.username, player_stats.game_id, player_stats.score FROM players INNER JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.level = 5 ORDER BY player_stats.score DESC;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM games LEFT JOIN leaderboard ON games.game_id = leaderboard.game_id GROUP BY game_name HAVING total_players > 50;

SELECT players.username, players.email, player_stats.score FROM players INNER JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE players.total_score >= 500 AND players.total_score <= 1000;

SELECT players.username, player_stats.level, leaderboard.rank FROM players INNER JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id LEFT JOIN leaderboard ON players.player_id = leaderboard.player_id WHERE player_stats.level < 3 AND leaderboard.rank < 100 ORDER BY leaderboard.rank ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_stats WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score, rank FROM players JOIN leaderboard_scores ON players.player_id = leaderboard_scores.player_id WHERE rank <= 3;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_stats WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, score, rank FROM players JOIN leaderboard_scores ON players.player_id = leaderboard_scores.player_id JOIN games ON leaderboard_scores.player_id = player_stats.game_id ORDER BY score DESC, rank ASC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, leaderboard_date FROM players JOIN leaderboard_scores ON players.player_id = leaderboard_scores.player_id JOIN leaderboards ON leaderboard_scores.leaderboard_id = leaderboards.leaderboard_id WHERE leaderboard_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
